name: Shockwave <x> inches
effect: If a critical dice is retained, weapon gains blast <x> inches weapon rule. (melee weapons treat as shooting actions against secondary targets)

name: Agile
effect: When resolving attack dices, resolve 1 dice before the fight sequence (if both weapons have this rule, active operative resolves first).

name: Fixed Result
effect: Attacks made with this weapon can't reroll any dice.

name: Mist-Accuracy
effect: This weapon isn't affected by mist's weapon skill penalties.

name: Drag <x> inches
effect: If a critical dice is retained, move the enemy <x> inches in the shortest possible direction towards the active operative.

name: Burning
effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply /3/ status to the target.

name: Bleeding
effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply /2/ status to the target.

name: Electrify
effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply /6/ status to the target.

name: Supressing
effect: Target operative and active operative roll 1D6 + APL if active operative score is higher, apply /4/ status on target.

name: Mist Dispersal
effect: Clears mist in a 3 inches radius for one round.

name: Psychic Push
effect: After attack, if at least one attack dice inflicted damage, move the target 2 inches. Roll one D6, on a 2-, active suffers 1 wound.

name: Life Siphon
effect: Select 1 friendly operative visible and within 6 inches. For each dice that deals damage, it heals 1 or 1D3 wounds if it was a critical. Once per turning point.

name: Quick Assault
effect: Once per battle: if this operative hasn't done a shoot action during this activation and performed a charge action, it can resolve two successful or critical hit dice in sequence and add 1dmg to both their damage characteristics.

name: Rending
effect: After rolling attack dice, if you retain a critical hit, you can retain a normal sucessful as critical

name: Balanced
effect: Re-roll one failed attack die.

name: Stun
effect: Target loses 1AP on its next activation.

name: Ceaseless
effect: Choose a number and re-roll all attack dice with results of that number.

name: Brutal
effect: Opponent can only parry with critical successes.

name: Punishing
effect: After rolling attack dice, if you retain a critical hit, you can retain a failed dice as successful.

name: Lethal <x>+
effect: Critical hits are scored on unmodified rolls of <x>+ instead of 6.

name: Shock
effect: After rolling attack dice if you retain a critical hit, you can discard one of your opponent's success attack dice (critical if no normal).

name: Saturate
effect: Weapon removes cover save bonuses.

name: Relentless
effect: After rolling attack dice, you can re-roll any number of dices.

name: Devastating <x>
effect: Deal <x> wounds on critical hits.

name: Heavy(dash only)
effect: This weapon can't be used in the same activation as a move action.

name: Piercing Crits <x>
effect: After rolling attack dice, weapon gains Piercing <x> if any critical hits are retainted.

name: Silent
effect: Weapon can be used on conceal order.

name: Entangle
effect: If damage is made with a critical hit, apply /1/ status on target.

name: Blast <x> inches
effect: All operatives within <x> inches of the target are also attacked.

name: Push <x> inches
effect: Move the target <x> inches away after a successful hit.

name: Psychic
effect: This attack is resolved as a psychic action.

name: Break
effect: After use, roll a 1d6, on a failed roll of +3, the item breaks.

name: Piercing <x>
effect: Before rolling defense dice, the defending operatives rolls <x> less dice

name: hot
effect: After finishing the shoot action, on a failed roll of 1d6 against WS, operative suffers 2x result wounds

name: Plague Bite
effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply /2/ status to the target. If the target is already bleeding, apply /3/ status.

name: Noxious Cloud
effect: All operatives within 2 inches of the target (including the attacker) suffer 1 wound at the end of the activation. Does not affect other Nurglings.

name: Shadow Claws
effect: After rolling attack dice, retain one additional normal success if the target is in a mist zone or Obscured.

name: Soulrender
effect: For each critical hit retained, heal 1 wound to the attacker.

name: Mist Resonance
effect: Attacks made in mist zones gain +1 damage. If the mist is dense, also gain rending.

name: Phase Shift
effect: During a charge action, you may ignore movement penalties from terrain while in a mist zone. During the turning point you use this rule, when fighting or retaliating, the operative must use this weapon, after that fight or retalaitiong you may move 2 inches in any direction ignorening terrain.

name: Vorpal Strike
effect: If the target is slain, this operative gains 1AP on their next activation.

name: Mistcloak Sync
effect: While in a mist zone, the operative gains +1 Save. If the operative is cover, they cannot be targeted by ranged attacks beyond 6inches.
